notes: All-new fifth-generation Ram 1500 on DT platform. Available with mild hybrid eTorque system (48V). TRX variant with 702 hp supercharged Hemi (2021-2023). 12-inch touchscreen Uconnect 5. EcoDiesel requires diesel-trained technicians. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram pickup article, January 2025 revision.

Heavy-duty Ram refresh with updated styling. Cummins 6.7L diesel produces up to 1,075 lb-ft torque. Available in 2500/3500/3500HD configurations. Aisin 8-speed automatic on diesel models. Towing capacity up to 37,100 lbs. Diesel and heavy-duty systems require specialized service. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram pickup article, January 2025 revision.

High-performance off-road pickup competing with Ford Raptor. 702 hp supercharged 6.2L Hemi. Launch control, off-road suspension, 35-inch tires. 0-60 mph in 4.5 seconds. Production ended 2023. High-performance systems require specialized service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram TRX article, January 2025 revision.

Rebadged Fiat Ducato. Front-wheel drive commercial van. Available in multiple roof heights and wheelbases. Diesel option 2014-2016. ProMaster City was smaller variant. EcoDiesel requires diesel service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram ProMaster article, January 2025 revision.
